abstract: Urges Brit Vice Adm Somerville to give true version of battle off Sardinia
snippet: ITALIAN NAVAL BASE "Y," Dec. 2 (UP) (via Rome)--Admiral Luigi Sansonetti, who commanded the Italian ships in the Mediterranean naval battle off Sardinia, today called upon his pre-war friend, Vice Admiral Sir James Somerville, ......

headline.main: NAVAL DEFEAT DENIED BY ITALIAN ADMIRAL; Sansonetti Calls on Somerville to Give Version of Battle

lead_paragraph: ITALIAN NAVAL BASE "Y," Dec. 2 (UP) (via Rome)--Admiral Luigi Sansonetti, who commanded the Italian ships in the Mediterranean naval battle off Sardinia, today called upon his pre-war friend, Vice Admiral Sir James Somerville, ...
